verses.roman:
pratāparudrere kṛpā kaila sei sthāne
gauḍīyā-bhakte ājñā dila vidāyera dine

synonyms: pratāparudrere—unto King Pratāparudra; kṛpā—mercy; kaila—did; sei sthāne—in that garden; gauḍīyā-bhakte—to all the devotees of Bengal; ājñā—the order; dila—gave; vidāyera—of departure; dine—on the day.
translation: In that garden, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu bestowed His mercy upon King Pratāparudra. Afterwards, when the Bengali devotees were about to return home, the Lord gave separate orders to almost every one of them.
